Package dooyit.logic.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoryManager
    CategoryManager handles the creation and management of category and its colour.
    ColourManager
    The colour manager will store all the possible colours tha dooyit has.
    DataManager
    DataManager is responsible for converting all tasks into taskDatas and loading task and category into logic from taskData
    HistoryManager
    history manager is responsible for adding reversible commands into history for undoing the command as well as redo
    LogicAction  
    LogicController
    The logicController process the input and perform the neccessary actions
    TaskManager
    The task manager is class that manages all the task and provides various functionalities: create floating task, create deadline task, create event task, remove task, find task, check if task manager contains the task, mark task, delete task, edit task, set task display id, grouping of task with filtering and sorting, search for tasks by keyword, day and month
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Action
    actions that the logic can perform
    TaskManager.SearchType
